visuals.title: Median Household Income by County
visuals.description: View an interactive map showing median household incomes by county.
visuals.teaser: Four of the top ten highest earning counties are in Virginia, home to many well paid government contractors.

visuals.title: The Highest and Lowest Income States
visuals.description: This interactive map shows the median income by state.
visuals.teaser: D.C. and several coastal states earn the most with median incomes nearly double some southeastern states.

visuals.title: Poverty Rate by State
visuals.description: View an interactive map showing the poverty rate by state.
visuals.teaser: New Hampshire and Utah have the lowest poverty rates while the Mississippi Delta region struggles with higher poverty rates.

visuals.title: Population by County
visuals.description: Find out which counties have the highest populations using this interactive map.
visuals.teaser: The most populated county is Los Angeles with a population nearly double that of second place Cook County.

visuals.title: Where Homes Cost the Most
visuals.description: This interactive map shows the counties with the highest and lowest home valuations according to the Zillow Home Value Index as of Dec 2024.
visuals.teaser: See which counties have the highest average home valuations according to Zillow.

visuals.title: Where Credit Card Delinquencies are Highest
visuals.description: An interactive data visualization showing which states have the highest and lowest credit card delinquency rates. Data is from WalletHub as of Q3 2024.
visuals.teaser: Credit card delinquency rates are highest in the southeast while the northwest stays current on their credit card debts.
